structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text: If a certificate issued under KRS 198B.410 is lost or destroyed, a new one shall be issued in its place by the department without another examination, upon the payment of a fee of one dollar ($1).
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 265, effective July 15, 2010; and ch. 116, sec. 22, effective July 1, 2011. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 88, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 6.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/1/2011). This section was amended by 2010 Ky. Acts chs. 24 and 116, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
